definition: to win by a narrow margin/to barely win/narrow victory

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: China narrowly beat Jordan Sunday night in the Asian Men's basketball championships final, 70-69.
sentences.chinese: 中国男篮在亚锦赛决赛中以70比69一分险胜约旦。

sentences.english: She won a narrow victory over her great rival in the tennis competition.
sentences.chinese: 她在那次网球赛中险胜了她的强大对手。

sentences.english: In the basketball game China beat the Japanese by a neck.
sentences.chinese: 篮球赛中中国队险胜日本队。

sentences.english: The horse won by a head.
sentences.chinese: 那匹马以一头之差险胜。

sentences.english: And they snatched victory from the jaws of  defeat in the European Championship Final in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 在2000年的欧洲杯决赛中他们险胜意大利。

sentences.english: Their team edged out the opposing team by one point.
sentences.chinese: 他们队以一分之差险胜对方。

sentences.english: We managed to squeak through the match.
sentences.chinese: 我们终于设法险胜了这场比赛。

sentences.english: Jordan Sunday night in the Asian Men's basketball championships final, 70-69.
sentences.chinese: 中国男篮在亚锦赛决赛中以70比69一分险胜约旦。

sentences.english: The American Team edged the Russian Team 98-96 in the last game.
sentences.chinese: 在最后一场比赛中美国队以98比96险胜俄罗斯队。

sentences.english: The Detroit Pistons were also advanced after edging out the Toronto Raptors in Game 5.
sentences.chinese: 底特律活塞队也在第五战险胜多伦多暴龙队晋级。

definition: to beat easily/to gain an easy victory
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
an upset (esp. in sports)/unexpected turn of events/to pull off a coup/a breakthrough
to score a victory/to prevail over one's opponents
consecutive defeats/to lose several times in a row
to deal the fatal blow (sports, chess etc)/to score the winning point
